article.description: Cent. Connecticut St. 80, St. Francis, Pa. 61
article.headline: Cent. Connecticut St. 80, St. Francis, Pa. 61
article.linkText: Cent. Connecticut St. 80, St. Francis, Pa. 61
article.story: LORETTO, Pa. (AP) -- Tristan Blackwood scored a career-high 28 points and Javier Mojica had 27 as Central Connecticut State defeated St. Francis, Pa., 80-61 on Thursday. St. Francis head coach Bobby Jones missed the game after being hospitalized for two days with stroke-like symptoms that began during Tuesday night's loss at American. Assistant coach Rob Krimmel saw the Red Flash (4-10, 1-2 Northeast Conference) build a 38-25 lead in the first half, but Central Connecticut State (5-9, 2-0) scored the final 10 points of the half to charge back. With the game tied at 50 with 13:22 left, the Blue Devils went on a 16-0 run, getting nine from Mojica. St. Francis went 8:18 without a field goal. Obie Nwadike had a career-high 17 rebounds and nine points for Central Connecticut State. Chris Berry led St. Francis with 18 points, while J.R. Enright had 16 and Devin Sweetney 12. Jones, 44, was released from Sibley Memorial Hospital in Washington, D.C., on Thursday after tests on his heart came back normal. "I'm OK," Jones, who missed the first game of his eight-year tenure at St. Francis, said by phone Thursday night. "I just need a couple days' rest."

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
